title: Unifying Analysis Tools with Rosetta.
abstract: The Rosetta system specification language will require a variety of analysis capabilities to assist system designers. The language's generality prohibits the development of a single analysis tool. It is proposed, instead, to leverage the existing analysis tools and create an analysis environment unified around the Rosetta language. A semi-automated tool, the Rosetta Nexus, will generated tool-specific analysis models and a correspondence with the original Rosetta specifications.
